name: 大厂打工人
description: 互联网大厂职场生存主题，风格现代、略带幽默

promptTemplate.base: minimalist flat illustration, modern tech office theme, clean vector art style, soft shadows, professional design

byType.action: dynamic pose, motion elements, energetic composition, action scene
byType.event: scene-based illustration, environmental storytelling, narrative moment, slice of life
byType.resource: iconic centered object, simple background, symbolic representation, clean design
byType.character: portrait style, expressive character, professional attire, personality
byType.modifier: abstract glowing symbol, floating elements, magical effect, buff/debuff visual

byRarity.common: simple clean design, muted pastel colors, minimal details, everyday feel
byRarity.uncommon: subtle details, soft glow effect, slightly vibrant colors, notable moment
byRarity.rare: intricate details, vibrant colors, sparkle effects, premium feel, special occasion
byRarity.legendary: epic dramatic composition, golden accents, lens flare, mythical atmosphere, career milestone

bySeries.work: office desk, computer screen, documents, professional setting, workplace
bySeries.environment: cityscape, weather elements, global symbols, external factors
bySeries.business: charts, money, business symbols, corporate imagery, market trends
bySeries.health: wellness symbols, medical elements, lifestyle imagery, self-care
bySeries.accident: warning signs, unexpected events, dramatic moment, surprise
bySeries.social: people interaction, communication symbols, community, networking
bySeries.growth: upward arrows, learning symbols, achievement badges, skill development

promptTemplate.negative: text, watermark, signature, blurry, low quality, realistic photo, 3D render, anime style, cartoon face, ugly, deformed, nsfw, violent, gore

visualSpec.artStyle: flat vector illustration with subtle gradients and soft shadows, Dribbble style
visualSpec.mood: modern, slightly humorous, relatable, professional yet approachable
visualSpec.perspective: isometric or front-facing, slightly elevated viewpoint

visualMappings.加班: person working late at glowing computer screen, dark office window showing night city, coffee cup, tired but determined expression
visualMappings.摸鱼: person secretly browsing phone hidden behind monitor, sneaky expression, one eye on door, casual posture
visualMappings.会议: conference room with multiple people around table, presentation screen, someone presenting, attentive audience
visualMappings.绩效: performance chart trending upward, golden star badge, achievement notification, celebration confetti
visualMappings.裁员: office desk being cleared, cardboard box with personal items, dramatic lighting, bittersweet moment
visualMappings.跳槽: person confidently walking through door towards bright light, new opportunity ahead, suit and briefcase
visualMappings.内卷: multiple people working intensely at desks, competitive atmosphere, pressure visualization, racing metaphor
visualMappings.躺平: person relaxing in ergonomic office chair, zen expression, plants around, peaceful atmosphere
visualMappings.团建: group of colleagues doing fun activity together, team bonding, laughter, outdoor or activity center
visualMappings.晋升: person climbing corporate ladder visualization, spotlight, congratulations banner, level up effect
visualMappings.述职: person presenting in front of executives, projection screen, confident posture, professional setting
visualMappings.996: clock showing late hours, person at desk, moon visible, multiple coffee cups, dedication theme
visualMappings.福利: gift box opening with benefits icons floating out, health insurance, snacks, gym membership symbols
visualMappings.面试: two people across table, resume papers, nervous but prepared expression, office interview room
visualMappings.入职: person receiving welcome package, new badge, excited expression, fresh start atmosphere
visualMappings.离职: person shaking hands goodbye, colleagues waving, mixed emotions, transition moment
visualMappings.带薪休假: person on beach with laptop closed, vacation vibes, relaxation, palm trees and sunshine
visualMappings.技术分享: person at whiteboard explaining diagram, colleagues learning, knowledge transfer, educational
visualMappings.代码review: two developers looking at screen together, code visible, discussion gestures, collaboration
visualMappings.产品需求: product manager with feature list, sticky notes, planning session, brainstorming
